name: backlog-mcp
description: Minimal task backlog MCP server for Claude and AI agents

scripts.dev: pnpm build && concurrently "tsx watch src/server.ts" "esbuild viewer/main.ts --bundle --format=esm --outdir=dist/viewer --watch --loader:.svg=text"
scripts.test:integration: pnpm build && kiro-cli chat --agent mcp-resource-validator --trust-all-tools --no-interactive 'Execute the complete validation test plan'
scripts.test:integration:resources: pnpm build && kiro-cli chat --agent mcp-resource-validator --trust-all-tools --no-interactive 'Skip steps 1-7. Only test task-attached resources (step 8): First create a test task, then create ADR, modify it, create multiple resources, link to task, verify lifecycle management.'
